TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When Mold Shambler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target noncreature permanent.
When Mold Shambler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target noncreature permanent.

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_TYPES ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_NthCardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:Destroy() end
